remarks: The predicate " ` F ` is a filter base."  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)
statement:
isfbas2 $p |- ( B e. A -> ( F e. ( fBas ` B ) <-> ( F C_ ~P B /\ ( F =/= (/) /\ (/) e/ F /\ A. x e. F A. y e. F E. z e. F z C_ ( x i^i y ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
